attributes.action: Raise the current amount of money given to those that receive Ema, for the sole reason of winding up those that don't get it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Raising the current level of money would greatly help out and aid those that are impoverished, as it is vital that those earning under £20,000 pounds to receive the money - as they struggle with their income.

rejection.details: Given your reasons for wanting the Ema increased, it would appear that your petition is intended to be humorous.
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
